DOC.brief_summary: Epidural analgesia early stage labor cervix < 4.0cm consider risk period increase rate cesarean delivery . The recent study investigator ' previous data indicate epidural analgesia perform early cervical dilation approximately 2.0cm . The investigator hypothesize different cervix diameter different rate cesarean delivery . This trial would investigate correlation amongst different cervical dilation risk cesarean section nulliparous woman term .
DOC.brief_title: Epidural Analgesia Different Cervix Diameter Rate Cesarean Delivery
DOC.criteria: 1 . Nulliparous woman 2 . > 18 year < 45 year 3 . Spontaneous labor 4 . Analgesia request 1 . Allergy opioids , history use centrallyacting drug sort , chronic pain psychiatric disease record 2 . Participants young 18 year old 45 year 3 . Those willing could finish whole study time 4 . Using use past 14 day monoamine oxidase inhibitor 5 . Alcohol addictive narcotic dependent patient exclude influence analgesic efficacy epidural analgesic ; 6 . Subjects nonvertex presentation schedule induction labor 7 . Cervical dilation 5.0cm great perform epidural puncture catheterization . 8 . Diagnosed diabetes mellitus pregnancyinduced hypertension 9 . Twin gestation breech presentation .
